meanings: this or that, one thing or[and] another (구어)

examples.korean: Why not write to her? 발음듣기 그녀에게 편지를 써 보지 그러니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Why not write to her? 발음

examples.korean: Paul can’t drive so he was a fat lot of use when I broke my arm. 발음듣기 폴은 운전을 할 줄 몰라. 그러니 내가 팔을 다쳤을 때 아무 도움이 안 됐어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Paul can’t drive so he was a fat lot of use when I broke my arm. 발음

examples.korean: It’s a shame about Tim, isn’t it? 발음듣기 팀에 대해서는 정말 딱해, 안 그러니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s a shame about Tim, isn’t it? 발음

examples.korean: Why don’t you give him up? 발음듣기 그 사람과 그만 두지 그러니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Why don’t you give him up? 발음

examples.korean: I don’t want to be a nuisance so tell me if you want to be alone. 발음듣기 난 성가시게 하고 싶지 않아. 그러니 네가 혼자 있고 싶으면 내게 말해 줘. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t want to be a nuisance so tell me if you want to be alone. 발음
